2.text: Bring the working yarn to front.

3.text: Insert the working needle into the front of the first stitch on the left needle.

4.text: Wrap the yarn counterclockwise around the needle.

5.text: Pull the loop down and off of the needle to complete the purl stitch.

6.text: Tug on the yarn before starting your next purl stitch.

7.text: Practice alternating between knit and purl stitches.

8.text: Make a simple rib stitch for scarves or blankets.

9.text: Create a stockinette stitch by alternating knit and purl rows.

10.text: Make the seed stitch by alternating knit and purl stitches.
